page.title: 14SPORTS CLUBS
page.content: Black Torrington Cricket Club began in 1982 and plays a match each week in summer. They have a 30 yard square on the playing field which is kept neatly mown.The pitch is moved to a different part of the square for each match. Money is raised by a 100 club. The Badminton Club plays in the public hall. 13 adult members play matches in a league from September to May. About 20 children attend the junior section. Formerly they used the school hall but moved to the public hall when it was extended. The skittles club fields two teams of six players every Tuesday throughout the winter. They play at the Torridge Inn. Each player bowls nine balls at the pins. The club belongs to a league and plays friendly matches. There used to be a football club which disbanded last Christmas.
